pull.title: refactor/doc: Add blockman param to GetTransaction doc comment
pull.body:
Follow-up to [#27125](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/27125#discussion_r1190350876)

This PR addresses a minor documentation and style nit mentioned during review:

- Adds the missing `@param[in] blockman` line to the `GetTransaction()` doc comment.
- Moves the output parameter `hashBlock` to the end of both the function
  declaration and definition, as suggested in the comment.

events.body:

Since this is just a doc change and not a refactor I'd just move the comment down a line and only make a change there.

events.message: refactor/doc: Add blockman param to `GetTransaction` doc comment and reorder out param

events.body:
Recreated the change locally, matches the version in the PR.

ACK 1a1f46c2285994908df9c11991c1f363c9733087

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -60,10 +60,11 @@ static const CAmount DEFAULT_MAX_BURN_AMOUNT{0};
  * @param[in]  block_index     The block to read from disk, or nullptr
  * @param[in]  mempool         If provided, check mempool for tx
  * @param[in]  hash            The txid
+ * @param[in]  blockman        Used to access and read blocks from disk
  * @param[out] hashBlock       The block hash, if the tx was found via -txindex or block_index
comments.body:
Just add the comment instead of changing the order of the params.

```suggestion
 * @param[out] hashBlock       The block hash, if the tx was found via -txindex or block_index
 * @param[in]  blockman        Used to access and read blocks from disk
```

comments.body: I followed the coding style from the documentation [coding-style-doxygen-compatible-comments](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/doc/developer-notes.md#coding-style-doxygen-compatible-comments). Maybe I might be overlooking something...

comments.body:
yea I agree that this fits and looks better with the out as the last param. Maybe you can change the title and commit message to be `refactor/doc` since code refactoring is being done.

But that is a minor nit
